official_title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives regarding the establishment of a National Blood Reserve, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Endorses: (1) U.S. participation in the World Health Organization's World Blood Donor Day campaign; and (2) the establishment of a National Blood Reserve to meet needs in emergency situations, domestic disasters, and terrorists attacks. Recognizes the Give Life Foundation's efforts to form public/private partnerships for the coordination of blood donor recruitment programs to supplement the National Blood Reserve.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives regarding the establishment of a National Blood Reserve, and for other purposes.
